mapper.select: select term_id,translator_id,meaning,`usage`,remark,update_time from dict_term_details order by dict_term_details_id asc

SELECT dtd.term_id,dtd.translator_id,dtd.meaning,dtd.`usage`,dtd.remark,dtd.update_time FROM dict_term_details dtd INNER JOIN dict_term dt ON dtd.term_id = dt.term_id AND dt.pair_id = #{0} AND dtd.update_time > #{1} ORDER BY dict_term_details_id ASC
select term_id,translator_id,meaning,`usage`,remark,update_time from dict_term_details WHERE term_id = #{term_id} order by dict_term_details_id asc
